name: FAnimNode_Slot
doc:
An animation slot node normally acts as a passthru, but a montage or PlaySlotAnimation call from
game code can cause an animation to blend in and be played on the slot temporarily, overriding the
Source input.

Source: The source input, passed thru to the output unless a montage or slot animation is currently playing
SlotName: The name of this slot, exposed to gameplay code, etc...
bAlwaysUpdateSourcePose: Whether we should continue to update the source pose regardless of whether it would be used.
